name: SHOOTER'S PARADIGM
description:
- This is a fun game to try your hand at Shooting, where you need to shoot the targets
(Blender made) that keep spawning in the scene, on a platform.

- By hitting a Target, you are awarded with certain points (need not be positive).

- Beware of the Grenades! They will cost you Time as well as Points!
And lookout for trophies, they will award you maximum positive points.

- As you advance through the levels, you will have to face with more and more Grenades with less time and more points to score.

-You need to score atleast 100 points in 60 seconds to pass Level-1 and 70 points in 40 seconds in the next Level to pass Level-2 and essentially, win the Game!
